description.value:
The skin of a shaman who selects the stone spirit takes on a rough, stony appearance. When the shaman calls upon one of this spirit’s abilities, tiny gemstones underneath her flesh pulse with a bright glow, like phosphorescent geodes glittering in a dark cave.

Spirit Magic Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.fv9mgob508qv99zz]{Magic Stone} (1st),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.gqtg9ruv8kkd0knf]{Stone Call} (2nd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.dkv9v4verb82fmpx]{Meld into Stone} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.l83djt5019ujasjh]{Wall Of Stone} (4th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.knyako6zopc1chrv]{Stoneskin} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wgm8mm1za909pwch]{Stone Tell} (6th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.g52zx1t1giteg5h1]{Statue} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oeemcnfjod9zd7my]{Repel Metal or Stone} (8th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.o8jhvddxgunzx94i]{Clashing Rocks} (9th)

Spirit Animal: The shaman’s spirit animal looks as though it’s made out of earth and stone, with tiny gemstones embedded in its flesh. The animal gains DR 5/adamantine.
